skill.name: devops-orchestrator
skill.description: Coordinates infrastructure, CI/CD, and deployment tasks. Use when provisioning infrastructure, setting up pipelines, configuring monitoring, or managing deployments. Applies devops-standard.md with DORA metrics.
skill.summary: Coordinates infrastructure, CI/CD, and deployment tasks. Use when provisioning infrastructure, setti...
skill.author: Brownbull

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill consisting only of markdown documentation. Contains no executable code, no network calls, no filesystem access, and no external command execution. This is a behavior definition file for AI orchestration.

content.value_statement: DevOps tasks require coordinating multiple systems and pipelines. This skill provides a structured framework for managing infrastructure, deployments, and monitoring with proven DORA metrics.
actual_capabilities: Coordinates CI/CD pipeline creation and management
Manages infrastructure as code with Kubernetes and cloud resources
Sets up monitoring and observability with Prometheus and Grafana
Implements deployment strategies including blue-green and canary deployments
Tracks DORA metrics for deployment frequency, lead time, MTTR, and change failure rate
limitations: Does not execute actual deployments or modify cloud infrastructure
Requires integration with real CI/CD tools and cloud providers
Cannot access external systems without explicit user authorization

use_cases.title: Pipeline automation
use_cases.description: Design and document CI/CD pipelines with automated build, test, and deployment stages

use_cases.title: Infrastructure planning
use_cases.description: Plan container orchestration, auto-scaling, and cloud resource provisioning

use_cases.title: Monitoring setup
use_cases.description: Configure observability with metrics, alerting rules, and dashboard definitions

prompt_templates.title: Create deployment pipeline
prompt_templates.scenario: Set up CI/CD for new project
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a CI/CD pipeline for my project. Include build, test, and deploy stages. Use a blue-green deployment strategy for production.

prompt_templates.title: Provision infrastructure
prompt_templates.prompt: Design infrastructure as code for a Kubernetes cluster. Include auto-scaling rules, resource limits, and backup strategy.

prompt_templates.title: Configure monitoring
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a monitoring configuration with Prometheus metrics, Grafana dashboards, and alerting rules for P1-P4 incidents.

prompt_templates.title: Review deployment
prompt_templates.prompt: Review my current deployment process against DORA metrics. Identify improvements for deployment frequency and lead time.

output_examples.input: Create a CI/CD pipeline for my Node.js API with testing and production deployment
output: Pipeline Stages: Build â†’ Unit Tests â†’ Integration Tests â†’ Security Scan â†’ Deploy to Staging â†’ Smoke Tests â†’ Deploy to Production
Blue-Green Deployment: Deploy to green environment â†’ Run smoke tests â†’ Switch traffic â†’ Monitor â†’ Keep blue for rollback
DORA Metrics Target: Deploy 2x daily, lead time under 1 hour, MTTR under 30 minutes

best_practices: Use infrastructure as code for all resources to enable reproducibility and version control
Implement automated testing at every pipeline stage to catch issues early
Always have a rollback plan ready before any deployment to production
anti_patterns: Manual deployments without automation increase risk and reduce reliability
Skipping monitoring setup means flying blind during incidents
Hardcoded credentials or secrets in configuration files expose sensitive data

faq.question: What CI/CD tools does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill provides templates for any CI/CD system including GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins, and CircleCI.

faq.question: What cloud providers can I use?
faq.answer: AWS, Azure, and GCP are supported. The skill works with their respective IaC tools like Terraform and CloudFormation.

faq.question: How do I integrate with existing tools?
faq.answer: The skill generates configuration files and pipelines that can be copied into your existing CI/CD infrastructure.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: This is a prompt-based skill. It only generates configurations and does not access or store any external data.

faq.question: Why is my pipeline failing?
faq.answer: Check the skill output for validation requirements. Common issues include missing environment variables, incorrect credentials, or timeout settings.

faq.question: How does this compare to other DevOps tools?
faq.answer: This skill acts as a DevOps consultant. It does not replace tools like Terraform or ArgoCD but helps design and document their configurations.
